#labels QNX,Neutrino,BeagleBoard,OMAP3,QEMU
==On Linux Hosts==
  * If you haven't already done so, [https://www.qnx.com/account/login.html#showcreate register] for a QNX.com account, by following the instructions provided
  * Log-in to QNX.com using your account, and visit [http://www.qnx.com/download/feature.html?programid=18773 this page] to download a copy of QNX Software Development Platform 6.4.0 (includes both QNX Neutrino, and Momentics - a customised version of [http://www.eclipse.org Eclipse]) for Linux
